channel.title: Is there a way to get less lag on Server?
channel.description: Okay... So, when my Server gets around 25 people it starts lagging. I would like to stop this. I was wondering if there was something I could download, or something I could use, or something I could include in my Source that will decrease the amount of lag that occurs when a high number of Player's are on my Server. Any help is appreciated, thanks!

item.title: Is there a way to get less lag on Server?
item.dc:creator: @Tycho Tycho
item.description:
@Tycho wrote:

You search for max players, It should have something like “maxplayers=15” or somethin like that, so I’d suggest searching maxplayers or if that doesn’t work search for it with a space btwn max and players.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to get less lag on Server?

ummm if you change the max players in client.java, then the server wont lagg as bad when you have alot of people.

What do you search for?
